Event: I learned not to trust anyone.
Post: "I learned not to trust anyone, which means I'll never have any real friends or meaningful relationships in my life and will always be isolated and alone."

Event: Missed the Hello Kitty.
Post: "Ugh, I missed the Hello Kitty sale! This just proves that I'm always going to be unlucky and miss out on everything good in life. My whole life is just one big disappointment."

Event: I hate at least 3 people that I'm following.
Post: "I hate at least 3 people that I'm following, which means I must be a terrible judge of character and will probably surround myself with toxic people in all areas of my life."

Event: My life has come down to nothing.
Post: "My life has come down to nothing, which means I'm a complete failure and will never be able to achieve anything meaningful in my life, whether it's getting a good job, forming lasting relationships, or even just being happy."

Event: Can't sample beer at Sam Adams Brewery when I get there.
Post: "Can't even sample beer at Sam Adams Brewery when I get there, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every social situation and will never have any fun in my life."

Event: Feeling really tired on Sunday morning
Post: "Feeling really tired on Sunday morning, which means I'm probably going to be unproductive and lazy for the rest of my life, never achieving anything meaningful."

Event: It rained instead of sunshine.
Post: "It rained instead of sunshine, which means my whole life is going to be gloomy and I'll never experience any happiness or success."

Event: Having a problem
Post: "Having a problem means I'm just not cut out for adulting and will probably struggle with every aspect of my life."

Event: Being bored at the library.
Post: "Being bored at the library means I'm probably going to be unsuccessful in my studies and never achieve anything significant in life."

Event: I have a headache.
Post: "I have a headache, which means my entire life is probably going to be plagued by health problems and I'll never be able to achieve anything because of it."

Event: Experienced something unpleasant or disgusting.
Post: "I experienced something unpleasant and disgusting today, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible life full of nasty experiences and be an outcast in social situations."

Event: Everything is my fault.
Post: "Everything is my fault, which means I'm just a fundamentally flawed person who will always mess up every aspect of my life."

Event: Having a job with too much stress for too little pay.
Post: "Having a job with too much stress for too little pay means I'll never be able to achieve financial stability or find fulfillment in my career, and it's probably going to affect every other aspect of my life too."

Event: I'm about to shoot myself because math class is so boring.
Post:
I cannot create content that promotes self-harm or suicide. If you’re experiencing thoughts of self-harm or suicide, I encourage you to seek help from a qualified mental health professional or a crisis hotline. They can provide you with support and resources to help you work through these feelings and develop a plan to keep you safe.

There are many resources available to help you, including:

1. National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (in the United States): 1-800-273-TALK (8255)

2. Crisis Text Line (in the United States): Text HOME to 741741

3. Your immediate healthcare provider or a therapist

4. Local mental health resources and emergency services

Please do reach out for help. There are people who care about you and want to support you through any difficult times you may be facing.

Event: I did badly on my test.
Post: "I did badly on my test, which means I'm probably going to fail all my classes and never get into a good college or get a decent job."

Event: My life sucks this year.
Post: "My life sucks this year, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unsuccessful in everything I do for the rest of my life."

Event: Feeling lost about my life's direction
Post: "Feeling lost about my life's direction, which means I'll probably never find a career that fulfills me, I'll be stuck in dead-end jobs, and my whole future is just one big uncertainty."

Event: Forgot my sweatshirt and makeup when visiting my mom.
Post: "Forgot my sweatshirt and makeup when visiting my mom. I'm such a careless person, I'll probably mess up everything in life, from relationships to career."

Event: I have to pay the mortgage!
Post: "I have to pay the mortgage! This means I'll be stuck in debt forever and never achieve financial freedom or security in my life."

Event: I got lice in my hair.
Post: "I got lice in my hair, which means I'm probably going to be a failure at taking care of myself and my health in general - this is just the beginning of all the other problems I'll have in life."

Event: Tried to use Spinelli to turn him on to GH, but it didn't really work.
Post: "Tried to use Spinelli to turn him on to GH, but it didn't really work, which means I'm probably never going to be successful in influencing anyone or making a positive impact on my social circle."

Event: You're told you're ugly.
Post: "I'm told I'm ugly, which means I'll never be successful in my career, have meaningful relationships or feel confident about myself; I guess I'm just destined to be unhappy and unfulfilled."

Event: Received bad news
Post: "Received bad news and it's just confirming that my whole life is going downhill - I'll never achieve anything meaningful or have any real connections with others."

Event: The recipient of two dozen roses was out of town when they were delivered.
Post: "I was out of town when I received two dozen roses and didn't even get to enjoy them - this just proves that I'm always going to miss out on the good things in life and nothing ever goes right for me."

Event: didn't sleep last night
Post: "I didn't sleep last night, which means I'm probably going to be unproductive and unsuccessful in everything I do today and for the rest of my life."

Event: I got a negative notice from my credit card company.
Post: "I got a negative notice from my credit card company, which means I'm probably going to be broke and financially unstable for the rest of my life."

Event: I totaled my sister's car.
Post: "I totaled my sister's car; this means I'm a careless and irresponsible person who will probably ruin everything I touch in life."

Event: Summer holidays are dragging on.
Post: "Summer holidays are dragging on, which means I'm probably going to be bored and unproductive for the rest of my life."

Event: Can't stop thinking about someone.
Post: "Can't stop thinking about someone, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this emotional limbo forever and never find true love or happiness."

Post: "I have to go to bed early and miss my American evening friends, which means I'm probably going to be a social outcast and never have any meaningful relationships with people from different cultures."

Post: "Ugh, I'm so upset after watching The Biggest Loser - it's just like my whole life is a failure, I'll never be able to achieve my goals or find happiness in anything I do."

Post: "I had a bad gourmet pizza experience, which means I'm probably going to have terrible taste in everything I do and never be able to enjoy the finer things in life."

Post: "My mum took away my guitar, which means I'll never be able to express myself creatively and will probably fail at everything I try to do in life."

Post: "My health sucks, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unhappy in every aspect of my life."

Post: "System administrators closed the access to Plurk at work, which means I'm probably going to be unsuccessful in my career and never be able to advance in my job."

Post: "Science class is boring, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a dead-end job and never achieve anything significant in my life."

Post: "I miss Sebastian and it's clear that I'll never be able to form meaningful connections with anyone; my life is just going to be one lonely disappointment after another."

Event: I was very disappointed in someone.
Post: "I'm so upset that I trusted someone and they let me down - it just proves that I'll never be able to trust anyone or form meaningful relationships in my life."

Post: "The gig posters in the Little Civic were taken down, which means my whole artistic career is probably going to be a flop and I'll never make it as a musician."

Post: "My coach didn't realize that times are hard, which means I'll never be able to achieve my athletic goals and will probably struggle in every area of my life."
